GSD.product_version: versions from v5.15 to before v5.15.64
GSD.description:
xfrm: policy: fix metadata dst->dev xmit null pointer dereference

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.15.64 by commit 96f2758a6d028d1ac08616de9c3c7ff2a122ecf1, it was introduced in version v5.15 by commit 2d151d39073aff498358543801fca0f670fea981. For more details please see the references link.
